channel.title: Split the lark and you'll hear the music
channel.description:
A special that focuses on the poetry and letters of 19th century American poet Emily Dickinson.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

image.title: Split the lark and you'll hear the music

item.title: Poetry and letters of Emily Dickinson
item.description: To celebrate the 1971 issuing of an Emily Dickinson postage stamp, actress Mildred Dunnock presents a program pairing the poetry of Dickinson with the music of Robert Schumann.
item.dc:creator: WFCR (Radio station : Amherst, Mass.)
item.dc:subject: U.S. Literature
